page.title: 03Tolworth Yesterday
page.content:
Mrs Blackpool,resident 1938 - 1951
"I moved into Tolworth around 1938 and i moved to a different in 1951.Ihave been living in Hamilton Avenue for quite a long time, it was quite different then in those days.There has been many changes in the area like the traffic,and a lot of buildings have been built,generally alot of development.In those days there were no worries about being run over by a car as it was very rare to see one!.I prefered the area in those days because there was alot more countryside and it was alot quieter as well. The traffic was also very quiet and so we could get to work withn no worries of being held up in the traffic! The A3 used to be called the Kingston Bypass.
